page.title: 08AN ORDINARY DAY IN OUR LIVES
page.content: At 8 o'clock I have cereal for breakfast and get dressed.I watch breakfast television.At 9am at school we have assembly.We do maths and English.Sometimes we have tests;do poetry,science(electricity)and creative music.We have playtimes throughout the day.School finishes at 3.30.At home I watch television,play with friends,have tea then go to bed around 9pm. I'm up at 7.30am,I make breakfast and take the childsren to school.I tidy up, do washing,make beds.I have dinner,wash up and go to Chorley to shop.Later I go to work as a cleaner at Secondary School.I come home,have tea,wash up, then watch television.When we've had supper the children go to bed.I prepare the clean clothes for the morning then have an hour's peace before going to bed.
